page.title: 13THE WALK TO ICOMB
page.content: Me Wayne and Mrs. Holmes went for a walk. We started at the church and went on to the river. I saw two mallard ducks and a cuckoo. For the walk we started at Bledington and we went to Icomb. We went past the reservoir and came to Icomb. We lost our way because a farmer had put barbed wire where we was meant to go. We tried to go around it but we could not find the right way for a long time. The fotpath was on the ordinance survey map. We enjoyed our walk but it was a bit tiring. Trevor Warne and Wayne Gorton.
